member.name: T:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.OwinHttpHandler
member.summary: Processes requests from System.Web as OWIN requests.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.OwinHttpHandler.#ctor
member.summary: Processes requests using the default OWIN application.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.OwinHttpHandler.BeginProcessRequest(System.Web.HttpContextBase,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Initiates an asynchronous call to the HTTP handler.
member.param: An System.Web.HttpContextBase object that provides references to intrinsic server objects (for example, Request, Response, Session, and Server) used to service HTTP requests.
The System.AsyncCallback to call when the asynchronous method call is complete. If callback is null, the delegate is not called.
Any extra data needed to process the request.
member.returns: An System.IAsyncResult that contains information about the status of the process.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.OwinHttpHandler.EndProcessRequest(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Provides an asynchronous process End method when the process ends.
member.param: An System.IAsyncResult that contains information about the status of the process.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.OwinHttpHandler.IsReusable
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether another request can use the System.Web.IHttpHandler instance.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.OwinRouteHandler
member.summary: Processes a route through an OWIN pipeline.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.OwinRouteHandler.#ctor(System.Action{Owin.IAppBuilder})
member.summary: Initialize an OwinRouteHandler
member.param: The method to initialize the pipeline that processes requests for the route.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.OwinRouteHandler.#ctor(System.String,System.Action{Owin.IAppBuilder})
member.summary: Initialize an OwinRouteHandler
member.param: The value to provide as the request path base instead of the current HttpRuntime.AppDomainAppVirtualPath.
The method to initialize the pipeline that processes requests for the route.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.OwinRouteHandler.GetHttpHandler(System.Web.Routing.RequestContext)
member.summary: Provides the object that processes the request.
member.returns: An object that processes the request.
member.param: An object that encapsulates information about the request.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.PreApplicationStart
member.summary: Registers the OWIN request processing module at application startup.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.PreApplicationStart.Initialize
member.summary: Registers the OWIN request processing module.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.Resources.Exception_CannotRegisterAfterHeadersSent
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot register for 'OnSendingHeaders' event after response headers have been sent..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.Resources.Trace_ClientCertException
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An exception was thrown while trying to load the client certificate:.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.Resources.Trace_EntryPointException
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The OWIN entry point threw an exception:.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.Resources.Trace_NoOwinEntryPointFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to No OWIN entry point was found..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.Resources.Trace_OwinCallContextCallbackException
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The IAsyncResult callback for OwinCallHandler threw an exception:.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.Resources.Trace_RegisterModuleException
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Failed to register the OWIN module:.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.Resources.Trace_RequestDisconnectCallbackExceptions
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The application threw one or more exceptions when notified of a client disconnect:.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.Resources.Trace_SetCurrentDirectoryException
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An exception was thrown while configuring the current directory:.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.Resources.Trace_ShutdownDetectionSetupException
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Shutdown detection setup failed:.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.Resources.Trace_ShutdownException
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to One or more exceptions were thrown during app pool shutdown:.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.Resources.Trace_TimerCallbackException
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An exception was thrown from a timer callback:.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.Resources.Trace_WebSocketException
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An exception was thrown while processing the WebSocket:.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.Resources.Trace_WebSocketsSupportDetected
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Support for WebSockets has been detected..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.Resources.Trace_WebSocketsSupportNotDetected
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to No support for WebSockets has been detected..

member.name: T:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollectionExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods for registering OWIN applications as System.Web routes.

member.name: M:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollectionExtensions.MapOwinPath(System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection,System.String)
member.summary: Registers a route for the default OWIN application.
member.param: The route collection.
The route path to map to the default OWIN application.

member.name: M:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollectionExtensions.MapOwinPath``1(System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection,System.String,``0)
member.summary: Registers a route for a specific OWIN application entry point.
member.typeparam: The OWIN application entry point type.
member.param: The route collection.
The route path to map to the given OWIN application.
The OWIN application entry point.

member.name: M:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollectionExtensions.MapOwinPath(System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection,System.String,System.Action{Owin.IAppBuilder})
member.summary: Invokes the System.Action startup delegate to build the OWIN application and then registers a route for it on the given path.
member.param: The route collection.
The route path to map to the given OWIN application.
A System.Action delegate invoked to build the OWIN application.

member.name: M:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollectionExtensions.MapOwinPath(System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Registers a route for the default OWIN application.
member.param: The route collection.
The given name of the route.
The route path to map to the default OWIN application.

member.name: M:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollectionExtensions.MapOwinPath``1(System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection,System.String,System.String,``0)
member.summary: Registers a route for a specific OWIN application entry point.
member.typeparam: The OWIN application entry point type.
member.param: The route collection.
The given name of the route.
The route path to map to the given OWIN application.
The OWIN application entry point.

member.name: M:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollectionExtensions.MapOwinPath(System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection,System.String,System.String,System.Action{Owin.IAppBuilder})
member.summary: Invokes the System.Action startup delegate to build the OWIN application and then registers a route for it on the given path.
member.param: The route collection.
The given name of the route.
The route path to map to the given OWIN application.
A System.Action delegate invoked to build the OWIN application.

member.name: M:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollectionExtensions.MapOwinRoute(System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection,System.String,System.Action{Owin.IAppBuilder})
member.summary: Provides a way to define routes for an OWIN pipeline.
member.param: The route collection.
The URL pattern for the route.
The method to initialize the pipeline that processes requests for the route.

member.name: M:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollectionExtensions.MapOwinRoute(System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection,System.String,System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary,System.Action{Owin.IAppBuilder})
member.summary: Provides a way to define routes for an OWIN pipeline.
member.param: The route collection.
The URL pattern for the route.
The values to use if the URL does not contain all the parameters.
The method to initialize the pipeline that processes requests for the route.

member.name: M:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollectionExtensions.MapOwinRoute(System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection,System.String,System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary,System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary,System.Action{Owin.IAppBuilder})
member.summary: Provides a way to define routes for an OWIN pipeline.
member.param: The route collection.
The URL pattern for the route.
The values to use if the URL does not contain all the parameters.
A regular expression that specifies valid values for a URL parameter.
The method to initialize the pipeline that processes requests for the route.

member.name: M:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollectionExtensions.MapOwinRoute(System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection,System.String,System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary,System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary,System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary,System.Action{Owin.IAppBuilder})
member.summary: Provides a way to define routes for an OWIN pipeline.
member.param: The route collection.
The URL pattern for the route.
The values to use if the URL does not contain all the parameters.
A regular expression that specifies valid values for a URL parameter.

Custom values that are passed to the route handler, but which are not used to determine whether the route matches a specific URL pattern. These values are passed to the route handler, where they can be used for processing the request.
The method to initialize the pipeline that processes requests for the route.

member.name: M:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollectionExtensions.MapOwinRoute(System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection,System.String,System.String,System.Action{Owin.IAppBuilder})
member.summary: Provides a way to define routes for an OWIN pipeline.
member.param: The route collection.
The name of the route.
The URL pattern for the route.
The method to initialize the pipeline that processes requests for the route.
